data.title: PEAK 2 PEAK Gondola in Whistler
data.meta_description: Winter or summer, see the mountains around Whistler from a new angle on the incredible PEAK 2 PEAK Gondola, now with access to the Peak Suspension Bridge. It's the ultimate mountain sightseeing experience.
data.text:
Summer Alpine Experience Tickets & Passes

June 15 – September 22, 2024

The Summer Alpine Experience is your ticket to access PEAK 2 PEAK Gondola, Whistler Village Gondola and Blackcomb Gondola

Purchase a full season pass for unlimited sightseeing throughout the summer.

Due to processing times, tickets can only be booked online 3+ days in advance. To book tickets within 2 days, please visit Whistler Blackcomb Guest Services or the Whistler Visitor Centre.

September 3 - 22: Access to Blackcomb Gondola and PEAK 2 PEAK Gondola only.

Day Tickets

Adult 19-64 Senior 65+ Youth 13-18 Child 7-12 Child 6 & under $99 $89 $89 $50 Free

Season Passes

Adult 19-64 Senior 65+ Youth 13-18 Child 7-12 Child 6 & under $155 $145 $145 $80 $15

Summer Access

The PEAK 2 PEAK Gondola is open from 10 AM - 5 PM daily. To enjoy the full Summer Alpine Experience, it is recommended to upload from the Valley no later than 4:30 PM.

Winter Access

Lift operating dates and times may vary. Please see mountain hours of operation for more information. All travel times are approximate. Only gondolas that are available for sightseeing are shown.

PEAK 2 PEAK Special Offers

Stay & Sightsee

From $169 CAD pp/pn

Set out on a 360˚ sightseeing experience. Sightsee & lodging packages from $169 CAD per person, per night.
